data.name: smb-databases-package
data.workflow_syntax:
package "setup_smb_databases" {
    use = "@jelou-marketplace/smb-databases-package:1.0.1"
    inputs = {}  // Creates a single "Pedidos" database
    variable = "database_setup_result"
    next = "process_setup_result"
    next_failed = "handle_setup_error"
}

inputs.name: orderDatabases
inputs.description: List of order database names separated by commas. If not provided, creates a single database called "Pedidos".

data.usage: This package automates the creation and configuration of SMB (Small and Medium Business) databases in Jelou AI. It verifies the existence of order databases (single or multiple based on configuration) and "Cliente" database, creates them if they don't exist, and configures the current user's profile.

data.name: package-conversational-eco

inputs.name: shopId
inputs.description: ID of the store (automatically obtained if not provided)

inputs.name: catalogValidate
inputs.description: Generate catalog bubble, only works if number is connected with native catalog

inputs.name: context
inputs.description: Additional context to customize agent responses

inputs.name: nativeCatalog
inputs.description: Indicates whether to use native catalog (true) or Facebook catalog (false)

outputs.name: Success Response
outputs.description: Contains type: 'success' and values with cart_order details and flow type

outputs.name: Error Response
outputs.description: Contains type: 'error' and values with error status, type and message

data.usage: This package provides an intelligent conversational agent for WhatsApp and Web, allowing customers to browse products, manage shopping carts and place orders through natural conversations. It supports both Facebook Catalog API integration and Native Catalog management.

data.name: payment-in-chat-package

inputs.name: provider
inputs.description: STRIPE, NUVEI, POCKET, POCKET_MEX, DATAFAST, PAYPHONE

data.usage: This package automates the complete configuration of in-chat payments for Jelou AI. It configures payment providers, obtains company and client data, builds payment requests, and executes a conversational AI assistant that handles payment flows with secure forms.

data.name: <UNKNOWN>
data.usage: The package is intended for database creation operations, but specific details are unavailable

data.name: payment-in-chat-package

inputs.name: provider
inputs.description: Payment provider (STRIPE, NUVEI, POCKET, POCKET_MEX, DATAFAST, PAYPHONE)

inputs.name: taxableAmount
inputs.description: Amount subject to tax (required for PAYMENT type)

inputs.name: planId
inputs.description: Subscription plan ID (required for SUBSCRIPTION type)

data.usage: This package is used for processing in-chat payments, managing payment providers, handling payment verification, processing subscriptions, automating payment workflows, and managing tax calculations.

data.name: smb-databases-package

inputs.name: orderDatabases
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of order database names. If not provided, creates a single database called "Pedidos"

outputs.name: Success Response
outputs.description: Contains cliente_database_id, order_databases, order_databases_info, message, cliente_exists, user_exists

outputs.name: Error Response
outputs.description: Contains errorCode, errorMessage, failed_at, and additional context-specific information

data.usage: This package automates the creation and configuration of SMB (Small and Medium Business) databases in Jelou AI. It verifies the existence of order databases (single or multiple based on configuration) and "Cliente" database, creates them if they don't exist, and configures the current user's profile. It's particularly useful for business workflow prerequisites, automated onboarding, AI agent tools, multi-branch businesses, regional segmentation, product category separation, and different environment setups.
